title: Potato Masala/ Aloo Masala
content:
Ingredients: Potatoes ðŸ¥”Â - 4 Onion chopped - 3 tb sp Bengal gram powder/ Besan powder - 2 tb sp Coriander chopped - 2 tb sp Green chillies - 3 Ginger chopped - 1 tb sp Turmeric powder - 1/2 tea spoon Salt - 1 tea spoon For Tempering: Mustard seeds/ Avvalu - 1/4 tea spoon Cumin seeds/ Jeera - 1/2 tea spoon Urad dal/ Minapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Bengal gram/ Senagapappu - 1/4 tea spoon Curry leaves - 4 to 5 Oil - 1 tb sp Procedure:
  • First chop potatoes into two/ four halves and boil inÂ pressure cooker for two whistles also add 1/2 tea spoon of salt and pinch of turmeric then add one cup of water in it
  • Let boiled potatoes become cool then peel off potatoes and mash them by using masher or with hands
  • Heat oil in frying pan on medium-heat
  • Add mustard seeds, cumin seeds, urad dal, bengal gram and saute till splutter. Now add curry leaves
  • In mixer grinder add chillies and ginger make smooth paste
  • Now add this paste and chopped onion in pan stir it till color changes
  • Take a small bowl add Bengal gram powder/ Besan powder in it
  • Now add turmeric, salt and Mashed potatoes in pan saute for one minute
  • Next add besan liquid to it and saute for 2 to 3 minutes
  • The curry cooked well when the consistency becomes thick
  • Finally add coriander
  • Serve it in a bowl with Dosa/ Masala Dosa/ Poori
